header.slogan: A platform to make the scale jump
header.subtitle: Simplify the management of your entity
header.body: Reducing the time we invest in the hard tasks of day to day allows us to focus on what brings value.

orders.subtitle: Orders
orders.title: Forget to close and send the order at night
orders.body: The members of the group place orders from their accounts and the producer can check the order made by the group. You no longer need to send you a spreadsheet.

reports.subtitle: Reports
reports.title: Receive orders in a single format and through a single channel
reports.body: You no longer need to be aware of WhatsApp, email or phone to know which orders you should serve the next week. Check what each group has requested in the orders report.

notifications.subtitle: Notifications
notifications.title: We send you email notifications
notifications.body: There's no need for printing papers anymore. You will receive an order confirmation by email with the details of your purchase.

help-us.title: Help us develop new features
help-us.body: Make your entity become a member and let's join efforts.
